metadata.title: CVE-2013-2184 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Movable Type before 5.2.6 does not properly use the Storable::thawfunction, which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via thecomment_state parameter.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-2184` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

movabletype-opensource - 5.2.9+dfsg-1
movabletype-plugin-core - 5.2.9+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: movabletype-opensource package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.2.9+dfsg-1').
